headingData.heading: VEENER-DOORS
headingData.desc: At Kastha we bring two different range of veneer doors that match your home or office decor.
headingData.point1: We use different veneers that can be perfect to go with any type of external or internal deviation.
headingData.point2: We polish the veneer with automated spraying machine for high-quality finish, we apply a protective coating on top for scratch resistance and higher durability.
